alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 09 at 1:42AM MST until January 10 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Gusts in excess of 70 mph possible along Outer Drive in Casper. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could blow around loose objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
